# ParcelData.ai
> Clean, universal real estate data for AI agents.

## What is ParcelData?
ParcelData is an open source real estate data platform that provides
normalized property data via REST API, GraphQL, and MCP server.
It aggregates data from 20+ sources, performs entity resolution,
and delivers quality-scored results optimized for AI consumption.

## Quick Start
pip install parceldata

## API
Base URL: https://api.parceldata.ai/v1
Auth: API key via X-API-Key header or Authorization: Bearer header

## Endpoints
- GET /v1/properties/{parcel_id} — Lookup by parcel ID
- GET /v1/properties/address — Lookup by address
- GET /v1/properties/coordinates — Lookup by lat/lng
- POST /v1/properties/search — Search with filters
- POST /v1/properties/batch — Batch lookup (up to 100)
- GET /v1/analytics/comparables — Comparable sales
- GET /v1/analytics/market-trends — Market statistics

## Response Tiers
- ?detail=micro — 500-1000 tokens (ID, price, basic stats)
- ?detail=standard — 2000-4000 tokens (full property details)
- ?detail=extended — 8000-16000 tokens (property + market)
- ?detail=full — 32000+ tokens (everything + documents)

## MCP
Server: mcp://api.parceldata.ai/v1
Tools: property_lookup, property_search, get_comparables,
get_market_trends, check_zoning, get_permits,
get_owner_portfolio, estimate_value,
check_development_feasibility

## Data Quality
Every response includes a data_quality object with score (0-1),
component scores, freshness_hours, sources, and confidence level.

## Links
- API Docs: https://api.parceldata.ai/v1/docs
- API Reference: https://api.parceldata.ai/v1/redoc
- OpenAPI Spec: https://api.parceldata.ai/v1/openapi.json
- GitHub: https://github.com/Dharma-Technologies/parceldata
- Python SDK: pip install parceldata
- MCP Server: npm install @parceldata/mcp
